name: Mitigation Playbook for Log Tampering Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where malware was deployed to delete logs and hide traces of unauthorized access.

action--fca49758-55a2-4d74-8fa8-b996afe2.name: Monitor file integrity for critical logs
action--fca49758-55a2-4d74-8fa8-b996afe2.description: Set up file integrity monitoring on log files to catch further malicious modifications.

action--2b5f6464-f65b-4935-afb2-4bb6540f.name: Kill malicious processes running
action--2b5f6464-f65b-4935-afb2-4bb6540f.description: Terminate any suspicious processes that may be causing log tampering.

action--4d8d2e35-3ff2-4ef3-8e47-66ef169e.name: Restore logs from a backup
action--4d8d2e35-3ff2-4ef3-8e47-66ef169e.description: Restore missing log files from a secure backup.

action--c115cd88-b09f-4a25-b7b6-9b2b9ee4.name: Run a security scan for malware
action--c115cd88-b09f-4a25-b7b6-9b2b9ee4.description: Conduct a security scan to detect any malware present on the system.

loop--38d30faf-6cc2-4fa5-b687-77b327e2a2.name: Notify Security Team
loop--38d30faf-6cc2-4fa5-b687-77b327e2a2.description: Notify the security team about the incident and wait for their acknowledgment.

action--notify-security.name: Notify Security Team
action--notify-security.description: Send notification about the incident to the security team.

commands.command: echo 'Incident detected on host-45' | mail -s 'Security Alert' security@xyz.org
